headline: HP DC POWER SUPPLY 20V, 4A
categories.lvl2: Test & Measurement Equipment  >  Power Supplies > DC Power Supplies
specstable:
Manufacturer Hewlett Packard
Model 6622A
Maximum Output Voltage 20.00 Volts
Maximum Output Current 4.00 Amps
Maximum Output Power 0.08 kW
Regulation Modes Constant Current Constant Voltage Constant Power
Ripple P-P: 20Hz to 20MHzRMS:20Hz to 10MHz
Panel Meters Digital
Control Type Programmable
External Cooling Forced Air Cooled
Other Information Features
  • Dual output
  • GPIB programming of voltage and current
  • Measured voltage and current read-back over the GPIB
  • Two outputs can be connected in parallel or in series
  • Automatic selection of operating voltage and current range
  • Programmable over-voltage and over-current protection
  • Self-test occurs at power-on from an GPIB command
  • Electronic calibration via GPIB
  • 10 store-recall states
  • SCPI (Standard Comments for Programming Instruments)
  • VXI plug&play drivers
  • 80 Watt
Power Requirements 120/240 V 6.0 A 3.0 A(2) 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Condition Excellent
Exterior Dimensions
Width 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Depth 25.000 in (63.5 cm)
Height 5.000 in (12.7 cm)
Weight 45 lb (20 kg)
